constraints.name: state_transition_constraint
constraints.description: 根据当前值和增量计算新值，判断是否达到新的状态（等级）
constraints.formal: new_value = current_value + delta; if (new_value in new_state_range) then transition_to_new_state

constraints.name: path_boundary_crossing
constraints.description: 每个状态（等级）有明确的上下界，新值必须落在某个状态范围内才能触发状态转换
constraints.formal: for each state S, lower_bound(S) <= new_value < upper_bound(S)

constraints.name: state_transition_constraint
constraints.description: 只有当第一次达到某个状态时才进行状态转换（获得徽章），否则不进行转换
constraints.formal: if (new_value in new_state_range and not previously_achieved(new_state)) then transition_to_new_state

result.description: 判断是否达到新的等级

result.name: monotonic_sequence_property
result.description: 状态转移方向受限（仅向右/向上），满足单调性：用户的当前评级和最大评级随时间非严格递增
